name: Re-Pear (Sean Lynch)
description:
Description:

In this game, you find yourself as a pear in a world where pears are being marginalized and even executed. Your job is to repair your fallen pear brethren and take control of the land once again. You will need to fight off evil pear eating creatures such as a bunny, a fox, and even a bear. Lastly, once the pear army is strong enough, take down the pear hating mongerer himself.... the farmer.

Controls:

The keyboard controls are WASD to move, left mouse click to launch your pear army, space to hop, and Q to toggle between solo and group mode.

Credits:

Sean Lynch : Programmed pear movement, camera, flocking,  and launching.

Caden Messenger (https://cadenmessenger.itch.io) : Programmed enemy AI, obstacle avoidance, and combat.

Skyler Zartman (https://skyler-zartman.itch.io) : Created all 3D art assets, and programmed random terrain.
